house_listing.house_description: Stunning comtemporary home in great neighborhood. New ceramic tile in foyer, parquet wood floor in kitchen, new carpet. All appliances including ref, washer & dryer. Excellently decorated. Yard has a relaxing setting w/2 decks.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Contemporary Style, Fenced, Foyer, Walk-In Closet(s)
